DOC.brief_summary: This study purpose ( 1 ) develop new energy expenditure equation ; ( 2 ) increase accuracy energy cost prediction cycle ergometer ; ( 3 ) find dependent factor .
DOC.brief_title: Study Energy Cost Prediction Cycle Ergometer
DOC.detailed_description: Oxygen consumption ( ml/min ) measure subject rest exercise four submaximal workload steady state cycle ergometer . Bioelectrical impedance analysis use estimate body fat skeletal muscle mass .
DOC.criteria: Healthy female Never receive bicycle train Exercise testing contraindication
